titles.title: In the Matter of Nancy Pelosi.
In the Matter of Nancy Pelosi.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: This resolution expels Representative Nancy Pelosi from the House of Representatives and declares the Office of the Speaker to be vacant.
